text: @realDonaldTrump Where's gov transparency? Where's your taxes? Who got billions of COVID19#? We need non-corrupt gov. Why are polls shut down in black communities. Why are you spewing racist rhetoric? Why are you asking foreign gov to help you get elected? Americans want truth & decency in the WH
